Caption: Audience at the 2nd Institute Day
Description: Sitting (second from right) in the first row: Mr. Y. S. Ramaswamy, the Superintending Engineer of IIT Madras, and his family. Mr. Ramaswamy came to IIT in the early 1960s (possibly 1961). He had been in the CPWD. (Source: Oral History Interview of Shri R. Natarajan, First Registrar of IIT Madras).
